meanings.definition: Extend over so as to cover partly.
meanings.sent1: The blanket overlaps the edge of the bed.
meanings.sent2: The two rugs overlap in the middle of the room.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces overlap perfectly, creating a funny pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her responsibilities at work and home often overlap, making her day hectic.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the trees overlap, creating a beautiful canopy above.

meanings.definition: To coincide in part with; have in common.
meanings.sent1: The schedules of the two friends overlap on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Our interests overlap, so we enjoy many activities together.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of the two ice cream scoops overlap in a surprising way.
meanings.sent4: Their opinions on the matter overlap, leading to a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The themes of the two books overlap, showing similar messages.
